Name: [u'Egg Noodles']
Directions: [u'In a large bowl, stir together the flour and salt. Add the beaten egg, milk, and butter. Knead dough until smooth, about 5 minutes. Let rest in a covered bowl for 10 minutes.', u'On a floured surface, roll out to 1/8 or 1/4 inch thickness. Cut into desired lengths and shapes.', u'Allow to air dry before cooking.', u'To cook fresh pasta, in a large pot with boiling salted water cook until al dente.']

Name: [u'Buttered Noodles']
Directions: [u'Fill a large pot with lightly salted water and bring to a rolling boil. Stir in fettuccine, bring back to a boil, and cook pasta over medium heat until tender yet firm to the bite, 8 to 10 minutes. Drain and return pasta to pot.', u'Mix butter, Parmesan cheese, salt, and pepper into pasta until evenly combined.']

Name: [u'Quick and Easy Chicken Noodle Soup']
Directions: [u'In a large pot over medium heat, melt butter.  Cook onion and celery in butter until just tender, 5 minutes.  Pour in chicken and vegetable broths and stir in chicken, noodles, carrots, basil, oregano, salt and pepper.  Bring to a boil, then reduce heat and simmer 20 minutes before serving.']

Name: [u"Grandma's Noodles II"]
Directions: [u'Combine egg, salt, milk. Add flour. (For thicker noodles add baking powder to flour before mixing.) Separate into two balls.', u'Roll out dough, and let stand for 20 minutes.', u'Cut into strips and spread to dry--dust with a little flour. Let dry for approximately 2 hours.', u'Drop into hot soup--cook for about 10 minutes.']

Name: [u'Lo Mein Noodles']
Directions: [u'Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil. Cook spaghetti in the boiling water, stirring occasionally until cooked through but firm to the bite, about 12 minutes; drain. Rinse spaghetti with cold water to cool; drain.', u'Whisk soy sauce, teriyaki sauce, honey, and ground ginger together in a bowl.', u'Heat oil in a large skillet or wok over high heat. Cook and stir celery, carrots, sweet onion, and green onion in the hot oil until slightly tender, 5 to 7 minutes; add spaghetti and sauce mixture. Continue to cook, tossing to mix, until the noodles and sauce are hot, about 5 minutes more.']
